title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Actionable controls for improving governance and compliance (COP347)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 改善治理和合规性的可操作控制措施 (COP347)
abstract: Organizations often struggle to translate complex regulatory requirements into practical controls while maintaining continuous compliance and security assurance. Learn how to transform compliance frameworks into actionable AWS controls through effective gap analysis and control mapping. This session shows how to leverage AWS Control Tower, AWS Security Hub, AWS Config, and AWS Audit Manager to build and maintain a scalable governance strategy. We'll explore real-world examples of mapping common controls across multiple frameworks, implementing automated compliance checks, and creating custom control deployments. Discover how to streamline compliance reporting while maintaining continuous security assurance across your AWS organization.
abstract_cn: 组织在将复杂的监管要求转化为实际控制措施的同时保持持续合规性和安全保障方面常常面临挑战。了解如何通过有效的差距分析和控制映射将合规框架转化为可操作的 AWS 控制措施。本课程展示如何利用 AWS Control Tower、AWS Security Hub、AWS Config 和 AWS Audit Manager 构建和维护可扩展的治理策略。我们将探讨跨多个框架映射通用控制措施、实施自动化合规检查以及创建自定义控制部署的实际案例。了解如何在整个 AWS 组织中简化合规报告的同时保持持续的安全保障。
